# presentationCount(for:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the number of items to be reflected in the page indicator.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func presentationCount(for pageViewController: UIPageViewController) -> Int
```

## Parameters

- **pageViewController**: The page view controller.

## Return Value

The number of items to be reflected in the page indicator.

## Supporting a Page Indicator

- **presentationIndex(for:)**: Returns the index of the selected item to be reflected in the page indicator.

items.description: Returns the index of the selected item to be reflected in the page indicator.
